comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool./Phase I Environmental Site Assessments at Kettle and Stoney Point First Nation, Mississauga of Scugog First Nation, Missinabie Cree First Nation and Chippewas of Georgina Island First Nation, and a soil sampling program at Beausoleil First Nation (Hope Island), and an Environmental Site Assessment Phase II at MBQ Turton Penn Property, all in Ontario.
